translations: v.滚屏；上下、横向移动；（使）像纸卷合（或打开）那样移动（scroll 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I scrolled down to find "United States of America."
scroll(fn) - called when an iframe is scrolled
Han Geng took my phone and scrolled through the songs with a smile.
sentences.translation: 韩庚接过我的电话，带着微笑在屏幕上下滚动查看我的歌曲列表。我想我是合格了？
